text:
Hi Milton,

I had the same problem a while ago. The best solution for me was to create a custom timeline event. You can send utk to create it and get a user id back. Then you can update user email using the received user id.
If you need some help with it just ping me directly in slack.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/timeline>

need to capture a ticket merge action (preferably as a webhook) is this possible? alternatively, if a ticket is merged, does the RESULTING record keep a reference to the former ticket numbers that were merged?

Hello Everyone, I have a question. Is there any way in API v3, to get field from associated objects? For example, if I want to get deals data, and also associate it with contact, Can I get field in contact beside id & type?

Hi Everyone! I’ve been doing a research and I have not found the answer, is there a way to copy all the “assets” from folder in “design manager” including the Custom Modules using an API? Thanks in advance!
